law.catch_line: Conditions applicable to area of sales responsibility of a new recreational vehicle dealer included in an agreement between a new recreational vehicle manufacturer and a dealer -- Prohibition against sales activity outside of designated area -- Exception.

text.section: A new recreational vehicle dealer shall not conduct sales activity or display for sale recreational vehicles outside of its designated area of sales responsibility except as provided in KRS 190.030(7) and the laws of this state.

law.history: Created 2014 Ky. Acts ch. 27, sec. 3, effective January 1, 2015.
